All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BoardElement
Board element is a class representing all elements that can be placed on our gameBoard.
CleverMonster
This class represents a monster that is clever and can find the player even if it is hiding.
Chest
Representation of a chest containing the fruit.
Fruit
Representation of a fruit that the player must collect.
GameController
The GameController class manages the game logic and coordinates interactions between various game elements.
GameControllerTest
 
GameFrame
GameFrame is a class extending the JFrame java swing object.
GameView
Is a view that shows us the Game and pages relating to it (level win/lost and menu).
Grabbable
Represents a object that can be grabbed.
IceBlock
IceBlock represents a frozen block on the GameBoard.
IceManipulator
Ice Manipulator class is used for manipulating the ice, it is used by player and monsters.
IceManipulatorTest
 
IsOn2DimensionalBoard
represents an element that is situated on a 2-dimensional board.
isPaintable
Represents a element that can be painted onto a GameBoard
Key
Key is an item that has to be collected in order to open chests.
Level
Level class represents a level that is being downloaded from the levels folder, it is therefore a object oriented way of representing a level.
LevelManager
This class is for management of levels and is communicating with the game as well as levels folder structure.
Main
Main class is the class containing the main method that runs at first and will execute the application
Monster
Abstract representation of a monster in the game.
MonsterThread
Thread class used to refresh monsters movement, is not implemented by timer
Player
Player class is used as an object representation of player playing the game.
ProcessTests
 
Reward
Abstract representation of a class that can be grabbed by the player and have to be collected i order to win a level.
Rotation
Enumerator for Rotation.
SelfMovable
Represents an object that moves itself when selfMove is called.
ShortestPath
Shortest Path Algorithm class, this class contains algorithms for finding the shortest path in the game board, taking ice into account.
ShortestPathTest
 
SolidBlock
SolidBlock class representing the Block that is solid and cannot be broken on the map.
StrongMonster
Strong monster represents a monster that is strong and can break through ice.
StupidMonster
Stupid monster is a representation of a Monster that is just circling around and is not using any smart way to find the player.
VisitedNode
Visited node is an object representation of an node on the graph that the Shortest Path Algo already visited.
WelcomeView
WelcomeView serves as a window that is being shown when the game is run at first.
